name: supre mega wars
description:
Friend of Bon's here. Bon spent a weekend totally out of it and came up with... whatever this is. I think you're supposed to be a goblin or something? Anyway, I've done what I can to make it playable, but even I can only do so much.

Also, Bon forgot to upload this and is currently passed out on the floor, so I'm doing it before it's too late.

You really owe me,  Bon.

(Apologies for the look of the page, by the way, but Bon was actually fairly specific about how they wanted it to look. Why that is I'll never know, but they told me not to change it, so I didn't.)

(Oh, and you might want to make sure your volume's not too loud.)

(You can also find Bon @BundlesNonsense on Twitter, if you actually want to look at more of Bon's stuff for some reason. I'm not judging.

Okay, maybe I'm judging a little.)
